# 连招3.0 - 乌鸦救赎

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/lianzhao-ver3
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/lianzhao-ver3
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install lianzhao-ver3
lianzhao-ver3 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g lianzhao-ver3
lianzhao-ver3 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
